interface.copy_failed.old: Unable to copy to your clipboard
interface.copy_failed.english: Unable to copy to your clipboard

interface.msg-indexing-desc.old: Some functionality may not be available until this is complete.
interface.msg-indexing-desc.new: 索引完成前部分功能可能不可用
interface.msg-indexing-desc.english: Some functionality may not be available until this is complete.

interface.release-notes.msg-failed-to-lo.old: Could not load release notes for {{version}}.
interface.release-notes.msg-failed-to-lo.english: Could not load release notes for {{version}}.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-star.old:
Obsidian stores notes on your device, so you can access them quickly and privately, even offline.
Your data is stored in a secure local folder called a **vault**.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-star.new:
Obsidian将笔记存储在设备上，因此您可以快速私密地访问，甚至离线使用。
您的数据存储在称为**仓库**的安全本地文件夹中。
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-star.english:
Obsidian stores notes on your device, so you can access them quickly and privately, even offline.
Your data is stored in a secure local folder called a **vault**.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: To access your notes on other devices you need to set up sync.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new: 要在其他设备访问笔记需设置同步
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: To access your notes on other devices you need to set up sync.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old:
Because Obsidian stores your notes on your devices, you'll need to set up sync if you want to access your notes on another phone or computer.
You can set up sync now, or just start writing and set it up later.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new:
由于Obsidian将笔记存储在设备上，如需在手机或电脑间访问，需设置同步。
您可以立即设置，或先开始写作稍后再设置。
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english:
Because Obsidian stores your notes on your devices, you'll need to set up sync if you want to access your notes on another phone or computer.
You can set up sync now, or just start writing and set it up later.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: Create a synced vault on your Obsidian account so that you can access your data from other devices.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new: 在Obsidian账户创建同步仓库，以便跨设备访问数据
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Create a synced vault on your Obsidian account so that you can access your data from other devices.

interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.old: Offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password
interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.new: 提供最高安全性，但需妥善保管加密密码
interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.english: Offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password

interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.old: Uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.
interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.new: 使用Obsidian管理的密钥保护传输中和服务器数据
interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.english: Uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: Do you want to exclude any folders or files when syncing to this device?
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new: 同步到此设备时要排除哪些文件夹或文件？
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Do you want to exclude any folders or files when syncing to this device?

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sign.old: Create an Obsidian account or sign in
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sign.english: Create an Obsidian account or sign in

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.old: Do you want to create a new vault or connect to an existing synced vault?
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.new: 要创建新仓库还是连接现有同步仓库？
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.english: Do you want to create a new vault or connect to an existing synced vault?

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-vaul.old: Your new vault will be placed in {{vaultLocation}}
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-vaul.english: Your new vault will be placed in {{vaultLocation}}

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-regi.old: Choose a server region near you to make syncing faster.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-regi.new: 选择附近服务器地区可加速同步
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-regi.english: Choose a server region near you to make syncing faster.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-encr.old: This password cannot be changed later. If you forget your password, any remote data on Sync servers will be inaccessible forever.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-encr.new: 此密码后续不可更改。如遗忘密码，同步服务器上的远程数据将永久无法访问
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-encr.english: This password cannot be changed later. If you forget your password, any remote data on Sync servers will be inaccessible forever.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.old: Your account **{{email}}** has existing vaults you can connect to.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.new: 账户**{{email}}**有可连接的现有仓库
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.english: Your account **{{email}}** has existing vaults you can connect to.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sign.old: Sign in to your Obsidian account
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sign.english: Sign in to your Obsidian account

interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-passwo.old: We have sent an email to {{email}} to reset your password.
interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-passwo.new: 我们已发送密码重置邮件至{{email}}
interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-passwo.english: We have sent an email to {{email}} to reset your password.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: Choose how to sync your notes
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Choose how to sync your notes

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: To use Obsidian on your devices you will need to sync your data.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new: 需同步数据才能在设备间使用Obsidian
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: To use Obsidian on your devices you will need to sync your data.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: Seamless across every device and OS.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new: 全设备全平台无缝同步
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Seamless across every device and OS.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old: Secured with the strongest end-to-end encryption standard.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new: 采用最强端到端加密标准
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Secured with the strongest end-to-end encryption standard.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-thir.old: May not be encrypted by default.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-thir.english: May not be encrypted by default.

interface.start-screen.mobile.opt-use-su.new: 使用官方支持的同步方式

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.old:
Obsidian officially supports two syncing methods: **Obsidian Sync** and **iCloud**.
However, because Obsidian gives you control over your data there are other sync options you can use.
These options include third-party plugins and other tools which may require more advanced set up.
To use an alternate syncing method, **create a vault** and follow the instructions provided by the plugin or third-party sync provider.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.new:
Obsidian官方支持两种同步方式：**Obsidian同步**和**iCloud**。
但由于您完全掌控数据，也可使用其他同步选项。
包括需要高级设置的第三方插件和工具。
如需使用替代方式，请**创建仓库**并按插件或第三方提供商的说明操作
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english:
Obsidian officially supports two syncing methods: **Obsidian Sync** and **iCloud**.
However, because Obsidian gives you control over your data there are other sync options you can use.
These options include third-party plugins and other tools which may require more advanced set up.
To use an alternate syncing method, **create a vault** and follow the instructions provided by the plugin or third-party sync provider.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-emai.old: Your email is required to create an Obsidian account.
interface.start-screen.mobile.label-emai.english: Your email is required to create an Obsidian account.

interface.start-screen.mobile.email-veri.old: You should receive an email shortly to **{{email}}** with instructions to connect to Obsidian Sync.
interface.start-screen.mobile.email-veri.new: 您将很快收到发送至**{{email}}**的连接说明邮件
interface.start-screen.mobile.email-veri.english: You should receive an email shortly to **{{email}}** with instructions to connect to Obsidian Sync.

interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.old: Your iCloud vault was not detected. This could be due to any of the following reasons:
interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.new: 未检测到iCloud仓库，可能原因如下：
interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.english: Your iCloud vault was not detected. This could be due to any of the following reasons:

interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.old: Your vault is on a different iCloud account than the one you are currently signed into on this device.
interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.new: 仓库位于设备当前登录的其他iCloud账户
interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.english: Your vault is on a different iCloud account than the one you are currently signed into on this device.

interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.old: Your vault is not stored on the top-level Obsidian folder of your iCloud Drive.
interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.new: 仓库未存储在iCloud Drive顶层Obsidian文件夹
interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.english: Your vault is not stored on the top-level Obsidian folder of your iCloud Drive.

interface.start-screen.mobile.i-cloud-un.old: iCloud syncing is only available on Apple devices. If your vault is currently syncing via iCloud, learn how to migrate your vault to a different sync service.
interface.start-screen.mobile.i-cloud-un.new: iCloud同步仅限Apple设备。如当前使用iCloud同步，请了解如何迁移至其他同步服务
interface.start-screen.mobile.i-cloud-un.english: iCloud syncing is only available on Apple devices. If your vault is currently syncing via iCloud, learn how to migrate your vault to a different sync service.

interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-invali.old: Vault location must be a folder.
interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-invali.new: 仓库位置必须是文件夹
interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-invali.english: Vault location must be a folder.

interface.mobile.feedback.label-feedback.old: Are you enjoying Obsidian? Help us by giving it a rating.
interface.mobile.feedback.label-feedback.english: Are you enjoying Obsidian? Help us by giving it a rating.

plugins.footnotes-pane.desc.old: Show a list of footnotes from the current note.
plugins.footnotes-pane.desc.new: 显示当前笔记的脚注列表
plugins.footnotes-pane.desc.english: Show a list of footnotes from the current note.

plugins.sync.label-sync-loading.old: Sync is still loading, please refresh this page later.
plugins.sync.label-sync-loading.new: 同步仍在加载，请稍后刷新
plugins.sync.label-sync-loading.english: Sync is still loading, please refresh this page later.

plugins.sync.label-connection-failed-des.old: Failed to connect to remote vault.
plugins.sync.label-connection-failed-des.english: Failed to connect to remote vault.

plugins.bases.desc.old: Create bases by querying note properties.
plugins.bases.desc.new: 通过查询笔记属性创建数据基
plugins.bases.desc.english: Create bases by querying note properties.

plugins.bases.label-any-of-the-following.old: Any of the following are true
plugins.bases.label-any-of-the-following.english: Any of the following are true

plugins.bases.label-none-of-the-followin.old: None of the following are true
plugins.bases.label-none-of-the-followin.english: None of the following are true

plugins.bases.msg-filter-simple-unavaila.old: This filter cannot be represented by the simple filter builder.
plugins.bases.msg-filter-simple-unavaila.new: 此筛选器无法用简单模式表示
plugins.bases.msg-filter-simple-unavaila.english: This filter cannot be represented by the simple filter builder.

plugins.bases.msg-filter-cannot-parse.old: Filter cannot be parsed. Basic filter builder cannot be used.
plugins.bases.msg-filter-cannot-parse.new: 无法解析筛选器，无法使用基础筛选器构建器
plugins.bases.msg-filter-cannot-parse.english: Filter cannot be parsed. Basic filter builder cannot be used.

plugins.bases.msg-error-register-view.new: 无法添加新数据基视图"{{viewID}}"，该ID视图已存在
plugins.bases.msg-error-register-view.english: Unable to add new Bases view "{{ viewID }}". A view with this ID already exists.

plugins.bases.msg-error-unable-to-parse.english: Unable to parse your base file:

plugins.bases.msg-error-unknown-view-typ.english: Base configured with an unknown view type: {{ viewtype }}

plugins.bases.msg-error-display-values.old: Display values must be strings. Value for property {{ key }} is not.
plugins.bases.msg-error-display-values.new: 显示值必须是字符串。属性{{key}}的值不是
plugins.bases.msg-error-display-values.english: Display values must be strings. Value for property {{ key }} is not.

plugins.bases.msg-error-filter-type.english: "filters" must be a string or an object

plugins.bases.msg-error-filter-must-be-a.old: "{{ conjunction }}" filter must be an array
plugins.bases.msg-error-filter-must-be-a.english: "{{ conjunction }}" filter must be an array

plugins.bases.msg-error-filter-allowed-k.old: "filters" may only have one of an "and", "or", or "not" keys.
plugins.bases.msg-error-filter-allowed-k.english: "filters" may only have one of an "and", "or", or "not" keys.

plugins.bases.msg-error-filter-failed-to.english: Failed to evaluate a filter: {{ message }}

plugins.bases.msg-error-view-name-invali.english: Missing or invalid "name" in view {{ index }}

plugins.bases.msg-error-view-incorrect-t.english: "{{ key }}" must be a {{ type }} in view "{{ viewName }}"

plugins.bases.msg-error-view-parsing-fil.english: Unable to parse filters in view "{{ viewName }}": {{ message }}
